title: Omar Sosa's typefaces & Siruca™....
content:
does anybody know where i can purchase the fonts created by omar sosa?

[http://www.omarsosa.net/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015212920/http:/www.omarsosa.net/ "http://www.omarsosa.net/")

Im also looking for this typeface, Siruca, designed by Fabrizio Schiavi

[http://www.fsd.it/fonts/siruca.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015212920/http:/www.fsd.it/fonts/siruca.htm "http://www.fsd.it/fonts/siruca.htm")

...cheers
author: j. cullen

comments.content: It's stated to the right that The Siruca typeface is custom type. I doubt it's for sale. You probably have to wait a couple of years before it can go public.
